lender.name: Craig and Kristy
lender.loan_because: I want to see hard working people grow.
lender.occupational_info: International logistics

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I want to help make other people's lives better...I want to make a positive difference in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I hurt my back at work very badly. I required 6 operations and lots of metal in my back so I can stand up. I am in great pain, 24 hours a day. I can not work anymore, but I saved all of my life, so I have enough money to live on.

lender.name: Denise
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I help people improve how they do business.

lender.name: Hannu & Kids
lender.loan_because: The mountain is there.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I want to give back.
lender.occupational_info: Student in 11th grade who is studying to be a businessman.

lender.name: De Simone Family
lender.loan_because: I want to help rebuild the world and make it a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I am a college student in the medical field and I am broke but with the help of everyone I loan to help others.

lender.name: Helen
lender.loan_because: The second greatest commandment is love your neighbor as you love yourself.

lender.name: Sondra
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a helping hand in their life when $$'s can make a change.
lender.occupational_info: I help people understand how they are spending money in the business they own.

lender.name: Kyla
lender.loan_because: My grandfather taught me to help others.

lender.name: Naya
lender.loan_because: i feel so blessed in my life and am honored to help others where I can.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: I want to help people and this is a way for me to help while i am still in school and studying to be a teacher.
lender.occupational_info: Student

lender.name: Harold
lender.loan_because: In my view, large government action tends to wasted and very little gets to the individuals who are most in need. Microloans can be directed like a very sharp scalpel to the precise place where funding can do the most good. As a side note, if I make a loan and am repaid, I can then use that as an example to encourage others to do the same and multiply my efforts and results.
lender.occupational_info: I was a science teacher at the high school level, mostly physics and physical science. I retired after 37 years of teaching and currently substitute and work on reading, my writing, and my hobbies.

lender.name: Economics class
lender.loan_because: as a class of economics students we want to participate in microcredit loans and learn more about how they work.
lender.occupational_info: Students and teacher at an international school in Cairo, Egypt.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: what you do is more important than what you say.
lender.occupational_info: I am a soldier. I have a wife and nine year old son. I have been very blessed in my life and hope I can help others to be blessed also.

lender.name: M. J.
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do. It's about independence and ideas, not charity and force.
lender.occupational_info: I make things, jewelry, clothing, art, photos and fiction. I make whatever my mind and hands turn me to. It is the greatest pleasure and the deepest satisfaction I know.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: my money goes totally to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired educator. I now do volunteer work.

lender.name: Bruce
lender.loan_because: It is so efficient, helpful and hopeful.
lender.occupational_info:
Trying to live a peaceful life while assisting others near and far.
brucemmoody@cox.net

lender.name: CherylS
lender.loan_because: I'm an idealist, but a realist as well. I truly believe we can all make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I teach in a small high school with a focus on helping students learn to work hard and work together to solve problems. It takes everyone to find solutions!

lender.name: Janete
lender.loan_because: I know how important is to have a help hand when in need and to honor those that helped me before.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: Many small steps towards helping will become big strides, every little bit counts and I want to do my part!

lender.name: Dimid and Mike
lender.occupational_info: I educate people about alternatives to Western Medicine.

lender.name: Erica
lender.loan_because: I loan because I have been given opportunities to improve my life and believe in paying it forward.
lender.occupational_info: My work focuses on developing affordable vaccines to prevent infectious disease.

lender.name: Sher
lender.loan_because: People need to support each other all over the planet in order to bring peace. I was lucky enough to have a few good folks lend me some money to restart my life after Katrina. It's time to pass on the good fortune.
lender.occupational_info: I teach kids about astronomy-- the stars--- about nature--- how animals and people live together and about how the Earth works --- like earthquakes, floods, and hurricanes.

lender.name: Liz
lender.loan_because: Had it not been for the kindness and generosity of others over the years, I might not have survived. This is one of my ways of paying them back.
lender.occupational_info: I have been unable to work for over a year due to the lack of jobs in my field as well as medical problems. I spend my time on the computer and helping others with their computer problems.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: Love

lender.name: Madeleine
lender.loan_because: I live
lender.occupational_info: I am a science researcher, I develop technology for studying genetics and health in animals and humans.

lender.name: Kenneth
lender.loan_because: This is the best way for me to try to make a difference.

lender.name: Rene and Donna
lender.loan_because: What a great way to have an impact on someone's life! And so easy to do. You can read about their goal, and be a small part in fufilling it.

lender.name: Joseph Dillard
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do, it works. it's people helping people.
lender.occupational_info: I help people heal, balance, and transform their lives.

lender.name: Adrienne
lender.loan_because: I can. I believe the concept of the microloan makes a great deal of sense, and am glad to have an opportunity to be a part of the process.
lender.occupational_info: I teach children and young adults, and I hope that I teach them to honor all people.

lender.name: Will
lender.loan_because: It is a privilege to be in a position to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I assist investors in making investment decisions (stocks, bonds, mutual funds, etc).

lender.name: Ashley and Trumon
lender.occupational_info: One of us is studying to be a doctor, the other is studying to be a lawyer

lender.name: Chuck
lender.loan_because: I have been really fortunate and I want to be able to help out people and share the goodness that's come my way.
lender.occupational_info: I am a information systems consultant and project manager. I help companies setup and manage computer networks nationally and globally.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: I am very fortunate to live as I do. I feel it is my responsibility to 1) realize this fact and 2) try to give something back to the world and help those not as fortunate as I.

lender.name: Orla
lender.loan_because: Such a small amount to us gives others a chance for a better life. This is truly a gift that keeps on giving.

lender.name: Gretchen
lender.loan_because: It's a great feeling to give money to hardworking people who will put it to good use. These businesses are vital to their local economies.
lender.occupational_info: My husband and I are small business owners. We appreciate the work...the trials and tribulations that come with running your own business and are happy to help others get started.

lender.name: Emily
lender.occupational_info: I study the solar system

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: My life is easy compared to most people in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work with children with learning disabilities

lender.name: Alan and Teresa
lender.loan_because: giving is a blessing

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I am my brother's keeper; there for the grace of God go I.

lender.name: BoLora
lender.loan_because: I want to be a blessing to others
lender.occupational_info: I work on large websites

lender.name: Tammy
lender.loan_because: It's really easy.

lender.name: Carla
lender.loan_because: I was part of the International 4-H Youth Exchange program and our motto was "Peace Through Understanding". I already give to the Community Shares organization in Cincinnati and I see this as a way I can share with the community of the world.
lender.occupational_info: I teach college students how to communicate more effectively in one-on-one, small group and public speaking situations. I also work part time as a travel agent specializing in Disney.

lender.name: Randy
lender.loan_because: learn, Teach. get, Give. Pass it on. Pass it on.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a nonprofit entity in Tulsa, OK

lender.name: Joseph
lender.loan_because: it seems like a good idea.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a computer science major at UCSD.

lender.name: Justin
lender.loan_because: Dividends from traditional investments profit me and my family alone. Dividends from Kiva profit the entire world.
lender.occupational_info: I create computer programs. Specifically, computer programs that run on the Internet as web applications and web sites.

lender.name: Niki & Steve
lender.loan_because: doing our small part can make a big difference in the life of someone else.
lender.occupational_info: Helping people discover and live their potential through leadership coaching and rites-of-passage work.

lender.name: Dave Nelson
lender.loan_because:
We make a living by what we get, we make a life by what we give...Sir Winston Churchill
I have the ability to help others; therefore I have the responsibility!
Life isnt about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself...George Bernard Shaw
lender.occupational_info: Graphic Design through print media

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: I like that I can help.
lender.occupational_info: I help send audio and video over the internet.

lender.name: Katherine
lender.loan_because: I want all families to be able to do better for themselves
lender.occupational_info: I work with low income families to provide health care and promote wellness

lender.name: Dana
lender.loan_because: I want to give back, what God has given to me. Hopefully, I can fuel a fire in others, just as it did in my own life!
lender.occupational_info: I maintain the oral health of individuals and teach them the basics of good oral hygiene.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: There are no ordinary moments - making a positive difference in the world is everyones responsibility.
lender.occupational_info: Helping people "get to the truth" about buying and selling real estate - empowering people's self expression.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: I am so grateful that what little I have may be of significance to another, possibly helping them in incredibly life changing aways. Our world is not so big- we are all connected.

lender.name: Debra
lender.loan_because: I admire people who are trying to create a better life for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I teach anatomy, biology, and environmental science.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: Micro-loans Work!

lender.name: Faith
lender.occupation: wahm owner of creations by faith

lender.name: Margery
lender.loan_because: change starts with one person at a time.
lender.occupational_info: i work taking care of kids - keeping them healthy and caring for them when they are ill. there is nothing better to brighten your day than the smile of a child!

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: We should strive to create a "we" society instead of a "me" society.
lender.occupational_info: I help people to present themselves to potential employers so they can get jobs that will make them happy. My work mainly involves creative writing and job-hunting advice.

lender.name: Debi
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do to help those in need and it feels good to help. This is a great organization !

lender.name: Wendy
lender.loan_because: it is the easiest thing I can do to help those in need. Not only do I help the person/business I am loaning to I am also helping their entire community.
lender.occupational_info: I am a social services student. Helping is my life

lender.name: John Melendez
lender.loan_because: Nos hace sentir mejor cuando tenemos malos dias. Makes us feel better when we have bad days.

lender.name: allan
lender.loan_because: I am from a small island and had to work hard as a child growing up. I know how hard it is for people who are trying to make ends meet, So from what God has given to me I feel I should share with others as he has blessed me greatly.
lender.occupational_info: i am a soldier in the US Army and want people to know that we as Soldiers Love them too, we are for all people no matter their race, color or national origin. We take orders from our boss like everyone else does. We just want to make the world a happier place.

lender.name: Douglas
lender.loan_because: I loan because everything seems right about Kiva and the work it's doing. Empathy, concern, empowerment, self-betterment, growth, cooperation...these are all positive forces in our world, they're key elements of Kiva, and I'm honored and humbled to be a part of all this.
lender.occupational_info: Nothing of particular interest here, I assure you...

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I wanted to help someone that wanted to help themselves to a better life.

lender.name: Wendy
lender.loan_because: I want to help, even if it's just a little bit.
lender.occupational_info: I write and produce online medical education courses.

lender.name: Mel Mathews
lender.occupational_info: I write books, fiction. I'm the author of the Malcolm Clay Trilogy.

lender.name: Manuel
lender.loan_because: I was told about Kiva and saw the opportunity to help. I live in Medellin, Colombia and I witness everyday how people can change their lives with a lot of support and a little bit of financial help.
lender.occupational_info: I am in charge of making EAFIT University develop and negotiate technology from its research groups within national and international markets

lender.name: Mavis
lender.loan_because: this is an easy way to help others achieve their goals

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: Kiva works.
lender.occupational_info: I teach literature to college students.

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: it adds purpose to my life.
lender.occupational_info: I evaluate brain function to help older patients with memory problems.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I believe that everyone should have the opportunity to run their business.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: it's an effective and simple opportunity to make a real difference for someone else.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: I'm tired of waiting for governments to do something. This direct person to person stuff may just make a difference in the internet world.
lender.occupational_info: I teach students history and political science in a California Community College. Our students range in age from 15 to 80 and it's wonderful work--these students are here because they want to be; they're poor, on the whole, and working while they go to college. It's inspiring work.

lender.name: Nikki
lender.loan_because: We are incredibly lucky to have so many good things in our lives and so much opportunity here in the US. If we all spent some time giving and helping the working poor in other countries, it would be a good thing.
lender.occupational_info: Student, I think it's universal.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: I would rather give to those willing to work than to those who want something for nothing.

lender.name: The O'Brien's
lender.loan_because: "Today, more than ever before, life must be characterized by a sense of universal responsibility, not only nation to nation and human to human, but also human to other forms of life". -Dali Lama
lender.occupational_info: Nutraceutical Sales.

lender.name: dave-O
lender.loan_because: self-motivated people trying to pull themselves up most certainly deserve a little help. The meritocracy works!
lender.occupational_info: I help make computer stuff work.

lender.name: Dawn
lender.loan_because: We are all connected
lender.occupational_info: Community Support - Volunteer

lender.name: Donnally
lender.loan_because: It feels right.

lender.name: Valda
lender.loan_because: I saw Bill Clinton on TV talking about this and I really admire him and thought this was a great idea.
lender.occupational_info: I design and maintain the website for the National Women's Studies Association. (NWSA) Our members are educators on University campuses in the US and some in other countries.

lender.name: Portia
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do. Everybody deserves a chance to be self sufficient and be able to work to support their family.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired teacher and now work in a library.

lender.name: Jacqueline
lender.loan_because: I see this as a valid way to help people who may otherwise not get the chance. Its great to see where my money is going. Its scary to think what is such a small amount to me, can make such a huge difference in peoples lives.
lender.occupational_info: I started Uni this year as a mature age student going back to get my first degree. Its fantastic! I should have come long ago. i am having so much fun, despite all the hard work.

lender.name: jen joy
lender.loan_because: i think it's a really great, practical way that i can help right now, where i am...
lender.occupational_info: i'm studying spanish and english writing and education, and i love playing music too!

lender.name: Garry
lender.loan_because: I believe that helping people to empower their lives is the right thing to do
lender.occupational_info: I manage a business that sells and delivers building materials to the construction industry

lender.name: Cindy
lender.loan_because: I am especially concerned about hunger and poverty and look for borrowers who truly need help or are providing a service to others.

lender.name: Debra
lender.loan_because: It is so very important to support a cause that is much bigger than I could do as a single individual. My family will pray over this new business and ask blessings for her and her family.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an emergency room as a registered nurse. I am also going to school to be an Advanced Nurse Practitioner for Geriatric patients.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: everyone needs a little help in the long run.

lender.name: Sky
lender.loan_because: It feels good:) This is a great way to help others who may not have had the opportunties or blessings I have had, and to connect with others across the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a middle school, with kids 12 and 13 years old. As a guidance counselor I help students with academics, friends, issues at home, and anything else going on in their lives.

lender.name: Justin
lender.loan_because: I believe the lender benefits the most in these relationships.
lender.occupational_info: By trade, I am in the computer security software business.

lender.name: Paul & Robbi
lender.loan_because: It's fun to help others!!

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: Societies advance when governments and financial systems work for all of their people. Microcredit makes it possible for those who do not meet the traditional lender criteria to have access to a fundamental resource that makes prosperity possible - credit. I want to give people the chance to help themselves and change their lives - experience manifest destiny.
lender.occupational_info: leadership in quality and test engineering. I enjoy spending time raising family and giving to charitable causes

lender.name: Marie & Devon
lender.loan_because: the world needs more people who care.
lender.occupational_info: We spend our days playing and learning about the world.

lender.name: Janet
lender.loan_because: it is easy to make a big difference to someone else.

lender.name: Unilove
lender.loan_because: I can. I loan because I care. I loan because I believe. I loan because I hope you will loan too.
lender.occupational_info: Market research for the Entertainment Industry.

lender.name: Leonard
lender.loan_because: There is no better way to hold people accountable for being responsible with the money they receive.
lender.occupational_info: I design experiences.

lender.name: Sandi
lender.loan_because: It's important to help one another.
lender.occupational_info: I help sick patients at the end of their lives.

lender.name: Tacha
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Bella
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone should have the opportunity to make a living and take care of their families.

lender.name: Sabrina and Matt
lender.loan_because: Kiva makes it easy, and has shown us that there are a lot of good, hardworking people who need help. It feels great to give.
lender.occupational_info: Sabrina works in the staffing (labor) industry, helping clients find creative workers in advertising, design and marketing. Matt is a film and TV composer.

lender.name: Angie
lender.loan_because: I think it's a great way to help people acheive their dream.
lender.occupational_info: I just try to be the best Mom I can.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: either we need help, or we need to help.
lender.occupational_info: I teach American history to university students.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: I like the way this organization empowers people. I am very blessed in my life. But if that were not the case I think an organization like kiva would be how I'd like to receive help. I am happy to support this initiative.
lender.occupational_info: I manage global training for my company. My teams train engineers who support our customers when they have problems with our software. We have training centers in India, London, Dublin, Beijing, Syndey and the US. I am very lucky that I get to visit these sites as part of my job. Kiva is a way for me to contribute to the global workplace.

lender.name: Carol-Coyote
lender.occupation: Importer of folk art from Mexico

lender.name: Kyoko
lender.occupation: I work for a trading company.
lender.loan_because: there are people who need it.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a trading company, importing chemical materials from US and selling them in Japan.

lender.name: James Beauregard
lender.loan_because: otherwise I'd spend it on lattes.
lender.occupational_info: books, music, film, running, coffee

lender.name: knnkanda
lender.loan_because: because someone development for The Earth care business instead of us.

lender.name: AKIO
lender.loan_because: I want to get involve personally to international cooperations.
lender.occupational_info: I am working as sales/Marketing person in Computer relaterd field.

lender.name: Jackie

lender.occupational_info: I find workers for companies.

lender.name: Daniel L.
lender.loan_because: to help, and make business stronger
lender.occupational_info: physical, and mental

lender.name: michael and family
lender.loan_because: we care
lender.occupational_info: I am an emergency physician and also a hospice physician. Patty my wife, a mexican-american is a physical therapist.

lender.name: Doreen
lender.loan_because: we need to work together to create a better world for present and future generations.

lender.name: Kuniko and Nozomu
lender.loan_because: we have a little to be used for something better
lender.occupational_info: We are trying to contribute in achieving a sustainable society

lender.name: Mike Manfrin
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance.
lender.occupational_info: Politics and Legal Studies graduate. I currently live in Rome where I am working on a novel.

lender.name: Gina and James
lender.loan_because: It gives people hope and meaningful work.
lender.occupational_info: Gina works at an agency that provides mental health services to those who cannot afford it. She provides therapy primarily for victims of domestic violence. On the weekends she works as wedding photographer. James is a store manager for a major bookseller.

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: I want to support other individuals who are trying to better their lives.

lender.name: Cesar
lender.loan_because: I want to give back
lender.occupational_info: I do daily Engineering Plant Support for a Refinery

lender.name: Kerry
lender.loan_because: I believe in empowerment

lender.name: naoya
lender.loan_because: I don't have much, but I just want to do something. Thank you KIVA.

lender.name: Mishary Al-Faris
lender.loan_because: It helps poor people and builds up their self esteem. And Allah wants us to help people.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a nation-wide Internet Provider network in Kuwait since 1998.

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: I want to help people start their own business just as I started online with telecom and travel services many years ago.
lender.occupational_info: I like to help customers on the phone or online and make sure that they are satisfied with our products and services.

lender.name: Cara
lender.loan_because: We have so much more than we need and others have so little. It is an honor to loan.
lender.occupational_info: My husband and I just moved to Switzerland. I am working very hard to get us settled.

lender.name: Dorothy
lender.loan_because: we are so fortunate to live in the US and giving to others is part of being a citizen of this world
lender.occupational_info: I help children who have been abused and neglected overcome some of their emotional hardships

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: It is the best way to be active in helping to distribute resouces to all who need them to succeed at their endevors.
lender.occupational_info: I design steel alloys for many different applications.

lender.name: victoria
lender.loan_because: I recently read "A Global Ethic" for a college course and felt overwhelmed by the problems so many face in the world today.I thought,how can I possibly help and then i heard about Kiva ,and my direction was clear.As a U.S. citizen I live a good life. For whom much is given,much is expected.
lender.occupational_info: I serve food in a resturaunt

lender.name: Atsushi
lender.loan_because: Think Globally, Act Locally, Act Actually!

lender.name: Curt
lender.loan_because: We are all just threads in the tapestry of this world in these times. I like the idea of a "fair go"for all people in all places.
lender.occupational_info: As a criminal trial lawyer I have seen affluent people do all sorts of stupid, greedy and crazy things during my career. If only all the affluent lucky folks would help those less fortunate...

lender.name: Tiffany
lender.loan_because: I'm inspired.

lender.name: Don and Frances
lender.loan_because: Our faith compels us to look outside of our limited world and understand that there are many who need a hand up instead of a hand out.
lender.occupational_info: I work in helping to establish new churches and pastor the pastors of these churches thru out the United States of America. Frances works to assist public schools to maintain a high standard of education and expectations in the school system

lender.name: Kara
lender.loan_because: when I was younger I had very little money, now I am better off, I wish to help others where I can. I also believe microfinance groups are far more ethical than traditional banks and tend to better help those with real need.
lender.occupational_info: I work with a team of network security specialists who secure and support the platforms that keep a very large telephone and internet network running.

lender.name: Lanise
lender.loan_because: It's great to feel that, by joining with others, to help others, a bridge has been made that creates a positive outcome for everyone and makes the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I have had many occupations: nurse, teacher, artist, and others.

lender.name: Frankie
lender.loan_because: It helps make the world a better place.

lender.name: Joakim
lender.loan_because: I have the economic possibility to make a change for people someplace else.

lender.name: Susanne
lender.loan_because: I want to help people be independent.

lender.name: Karla & Sanjay
lender.loan_because: every little bit helps.

lender.name: Jeff and Eric
lender.loan_because: It is an effective way to empower individuals and have a significant economic multiplier effect in impoverished parts of the world

lender.name: Lynn
lender.loan_because: My family is warm and safe and I want to share with others
lender.occupational_info: I test new software (computers) to make sure they do what they were disigned to do.

lender.name: Aaron
lender.loan_because: I am blessed with so much!
lender.occupational_info: Grade six-ers listen to me. EAVB_HKPQEZXLDO

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I receive a great deal of satisfaction from helping people improve their lives. I believe many of these people just need a helping hand to get things rolling .
lender.occupational_info: I am a self employed food distributor in San Francisco and I can appreciate how difficult it is to get a business up and running.

lender.name: Carmen & Norman
lender.loan_because: I know what its like to see people struggle in third world countries. I see the lack of job opportunities and how discriminative employers can be especially towards age. Norman inspires me to give to those less fortunate. Being an immigrant in this country and making less than $8/hour, he sponsored a child through Children International. I aspire to be like him, not so selfish. Even though I have large student loans and other financial obligations, I'm committed to lending and helping others.
lender.occupational_info: Hiking Machu Picchu in 2005 was a life changing experience for me. Because I am fluent in Spanish, I was able to communicate with the guide and porters. I saw how proud they were to earn enough money to send their kids to school. It was a rewarding experience and an eye opener...

lender.name: Geralde & Jeff
lender.loan_because: we are among the privileged of the world and we don't need to worry about where the next meal will come from. I truly believe that the micro-lending dynamic can make a BIG difference for impoverished individuals, families and communities as opposed to many big programs that make only a little difference !
lender.occupational_info: We share tools with couples in a workshop setting that can help them deepen and enrich their relationship on all levels, with an emphasis on the spiritual dimension of the relationship.

lender.name: Joy
lender.loan_because: I think this program is a great idea. I want to help people help themselves and their communities rather than just give a donation.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an agency of the U.S. government that enforces laws which prohibit discrimination based on race, color, sex, religion, national origin, age or disability.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an nonprofit organization that improves the healthcare given to people with kidney disease.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: I can learn about people in other parts of the world and help them.

lender.name: Adrian
lender.occupational_info: I am a front desk agent at a hotel in Seattle.

lender.name: Marian
lender.loan_because: I care
lender.occupational_info: helping people transcend and heal

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: We who are more fortunate need to help those who are trying to better themselves and their families for thier well being and the good of this World!
lender.occupational_info: Filled with volunteer work for veterans and the less fortunate.

lender.name: Earl
lender.loan_because: In my life people have helped me. This is how I honor those people.
lender.occupational_info: I work in construction.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I want to help small business owners who in turn help their communities
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired computer software designer who volunteers at local non-profit organizations

lender.name: Cory
lender.loan_because: I heard about it from my AP Economics teacher, and Bill Clinton. It's a small contribution that seems to have really good effects.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student, a senior in high school, applying to college this year.

lender.name: Robert Holbert
lender.loan_because: I believe it is important to help those who are less fortunate than me. Microfinancing may require little effort on my part, but it provides an opportunity to those in need.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a store manager for a regional retail corporation. I am also currently pursuing a bachelor's degree in political science.

lender.name: Bruce
lender.loan_because: How could you not help. All of these people are in difficult situations and are not looking for a handout but help to make their business work.
lender.occupational_info: I wouldn't want to try.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: It's a small way to help someone who needs it.
lender.occupational_info: I work with addicts and their families to help them make positive changes in their lives.

lender.name: Jerome
lender.loan_because: Microfinance helps reconnect the human spirit. Sustainable economies are the key to a more peaceful world. Responsible economic growth through microfinance provides a foundation for solving many problems which cannot be solved through large donations or Government funding. One example is where the local farmer was put out of business when the large trucks filled with donated food showed up (creating an economic imbalance) and when the donated food was gone, the village once again suffered due to the lack of a local food source and a sustainable local economy. Of course this is a complicated issue as communities need both emergency aid and a sustainable local economy. By helping provide a stable local economy through responsible microfinance, we can help limit the severity on future emergencies and enable people to realize good and productive lives.
lender.occupational_info: I manage people and finances for a living. Helping others helps me too! It is very enriching. We are in this together.

lender.name: helen
lender.loan_because: it's right in every way. I don't have to have millions to do some good. I don't have to give to an agency and just hope for the best. When the loan is repaid, someone else can get some help. I can tell my students about it.
lender.occupational_info: I help students who fell behind in their High School work so badly that they might be drop-outs except for our program. We are very successful. I teach Social Studies, English, Science, Art,& Parenting.

lender.name: Natalie
lender.loan_because: I think access to sufficient food and water is a basic human right.
lender.occupational_info: I work with food security issues in the developing world.

lender.name: Nan
lender.loan_because: I am so thankful for the blessings of my life. Hoping this will bless the dreams of others.
lender.occupational_info: I now sell organic Cowgirl Creamery cheese as my part-time retirement job. I also love to travel.

lender.name: Jon
lender.loan_because: We are all in this togeather and it up to us to help each other
lender.occupational_info: I design and manufacture custom jewelery using lost wax and fabracation

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: It feels good to make a difference in someone's life

lender.name: frikinerd
lender.loan_because: I want to help somehow and I think Kiva is the best way of doing it so far, because it's quite straight to the people who need money. The way Kiva works helps people to understand business, so instead of giving food to hungry people, it shows them how to get it by themselves, which is a real long term solution for developing countries.
lender.occupational_info: It doesn't matter

lender.name: Rich & Alice
lender.loan_because: It's a great idea! Kiva has made microfinance personal and accessible...

lender.name: Carly
lender.occupation: teacher of deaf and hard of hearing

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: It's a way to help provide others with the chance to build a better life based upon their own hard work.
lender.occupational_info: I help clients resolve disputes that typically arise out of construction projects.

lender.name: Janifer
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: Autumn & Rick
lender.loan_because: it is a unique and easy opportunity to change the lives of people around the world.

lender.name: Caleb & Samantha
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to give themselves a better life, and micro-lending is a wonderful way to help people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a graphic design student. I plan on working in the print industry, doing design and layout work for publication. Samantha has a degree in community service and liberal arts and hopes to soon become a law student, specializing in non-profit law.

lender.name: Ben W.
lender.loan_because: I've gotten a lot of help from people and everyone deserves some help to start a new business or project that will improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: Building online businesses and enabling people to create online.

lender.name: Christina
lender.loan_because: I can and because I hope that if someone is helped by a stranger they will be more ready to help a stranger themself
lender.occupational_info: I work on teams that develop medicines

lender.name: Christa
lender.loan_because: I have been very blessed and have had many helpful people in my life, now I can give back by paying it forward.
lender.occupational_info: Customer Service--We do all that we can within reason to make our customers happy with the service we provide.

lender.name: Chris and Marcia
lender.loan_because: we are able to... and that's really all that matters.
lender.occupational_info: Chris does business development for a small technology company and helps people generate greater business opportunities. Marcia is a physical therapist and treats patients who have injured themselves and helps them relieve their pain. Our children are grown-- one lives near us in the SF Bay area and the other lives in Southern California.

lender.name: Jeremia
lender.loan_because: I believe in the potential of hardworking people

lender.name: kamran
lender.loan_because: i need it for me and my family to survive in life.
lender.occupational_info: i can work as or can do: accountant,computer operator,admin officer,paybill assistant,office manager,NGO officer,drive a acar for taxi use,wholesale and other bizs

lender.name: Kathryn
lender.loan_because: It is my responsibility to make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I work for my city to create jobs and revitalize the community.

lender.name: Ross
lender.loan_because: It changes lives.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: someone helped me one time, so i should help someone else.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: GOD blessed me, so it is right that I pass on some of that blessing.
lender.occupational_info: I deal cards at a casino in Las Vegas.

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: I am committed to the principle of micro-loans. So much good comes from minimal donations. So many people gain a helping hand when they need it!

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: Small actions can make big differences in peoples lives.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: Microloans have been shown to be pretty effective in the developing world. I believe they are a more fair, moral way of lending than World Bank or IMF programs.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a computer software company. I teach classes to customers who have purchased our software.

lender.name: Alicia
lender.loan_because: I want to help.

lender.name: Genevieve and Matt
lender.loan_because: We want things to be better, and we believe that everyone deserves the help they need to build their dreams or improve their quality of life.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I think it an obligation for everyone passing through this world to leave it a little better upon departure than it was upon his or her arrival.
lender.occupational_info: I teach in a high school, I write fiction, and I am a professional photographer.

lender.name: Drew & Blake
lender.loan_because: We are called to love our neighbor as our self.
lender.occupational_info: A blessing.

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: I can help someone else make life a little better.
lender.occupational_info: I write information that helps people use products.

lender.name: lesley
lender.loan_because: I think this program is wonderful and so little can go such a long way to help people provide for their families and themselves. it feels good to be part of this group
lender.occupational_info: I like to make peoples gardens beautiful, relaxing and functional. Gardening is such a healthy way to express your self

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I want to support the growth of small businesses through direct lending.
lender.occupational_info: As CFO, I make sure that the company I work for collects its payments, pays its bills and employees, and make sure that the company follows all laws and regulations.

lender.name: Curt & Kaite
lender.loan_because: I want those who are striving to make a better life for themselves and thier family to have the opportunity and resources to enable them to do so.
lender.occupational_info: I teach 14 & 15 year olds world history, and strive to do so in a manner to give them many different perspectives on why and how the world is what it is today, and to encourage them to be active citizens of the global community in which they live.

lender.name: Dana
lender.loan_because: I care
lender.occupational_info: I work in an international boarding high school, teaching children from all over the world

lender.name: Rod
lender.loan_because: I have a heart to lift up people that are trapped in poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I review tax law cases. I have been to Kenya on missions with my church and volunteer and sponser a World Vision boy and girl. Pokot boy in Kenya and Ethiopian girl. My passion is to help the poor and marginalized people that do not have a voice in this world.

lender.name: Julia
lender.loan_because: I like to help people.
lender.occupational_info: I teach math at a community college.

lender.name: Jami
lender.loan_because: I want to enpower people to help themselves to improve their lives. And the benefits from this program will grow well beyond the size of the initial loan.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: it's simple - give a man a fish, he eats today, teach a man to fish, he feeds a village.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a CPA and financial advisor to troubled companies.

lender.name: Scott & Delsey
lender.loan_because: In this crazy world - this is something we can actually do - and feel good about doing it.

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: I can. Because so little can make such a huge difference in a developing country. I love to fund ice cream vendors.

lender.name: Bernard
lender.loan_because: It's a great idea !
lender.occupational_info: I design radio systems for Metro Rail, Police and Fire Departments

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: Give someone a hand. You never know when you may need a hand in the future.

lender.name: Dustin
lender.loan_because: Deuteronomy 8:18 Remember the Lord your God, for it is he who gives you the ability to produce wealth.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a student of microlending - researching and evaluating the impact of microloans. I can see the importance and responsibility of those with resources to help those with less.

lender.name: ELAINE
lender.occupational_info: BUILDING VINEYARDS, ORCHARDS, WATERFALLS, GARDEN WALLS, IRRIGATION, MAINTENANCE AND DESIGN.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: This is a great opportunity to help fellow business owners succeed.
lender.occupational_info: We sell general merchandise to the grocery industry in the USA.

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: I've been blessed to have so much, while others have so little.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I am at a point in my life that I have the financial opportunity to help people in need who want to better themselves. I believe that in today's world it is very hard for people to get a head of the bills, especially when trying to run a small business.
lender.occupational_info: I'm schooled as a writer and work in marketing and public relations for a non-profit insurance association. I also head up an real estate investor group. But, my heart is in creating, and I love to paint and write.

lender.name: James C Burke
lender.loan_because: I need to give the resources the Lord has asked me to distribute in the most honorable way possible.
lender.occupational_info: I work with leaders of charitable organizations to create a team environment where as many resources as possible help to support the poor, disenfranchised and those who seek justice.

lender.name: Victoria
lender.loan_because: I like helping other women realize their dreams.

lender.name: Alexandra
lender.occupational_info: Boring.

lender.name: Jacob
lender.loan_because: it's a small way I can promote economic development.

lender.name: Samuel
lender.loan_because: This is too great of a chance to pass up and not help people out. There's such a small risk involved, and the results can be life-changing all around the world. I think that's just awesome.
lender.occupational_info: I study Philosophy at the University of Colorado.

lender.name: Martin
lender.loan_because: Its a transparent way to help motivated people to improve their situation in a sustainable way. Also because Bill Clinton told me to.
lender.occupational_info: Longs hours of sitting in a dark library, reading engineering books.

lender.name: Drew & Lacey
lender.loan_because: I want to support South American Economics and small businesses.

lender.name: Adam & Shonda
lender.loan_because: We want to help folks.
lender.occupational_info: I pay claims for car accidents. She sells books and goes to school.

lender.name: Fred
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do. Global powers have played their politics in places like Africa for far too long, and it's time to reverse the misery created by their colonial greed.
lender.occupational_info: In my job I get to help people with computer problems and learn about new technology.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I hope to assist other women in becomming self sufficient, and to give them a helping hand.
lender.occupational_info: I am responsible for the management and marketing of a small manufacturing company in the USA. The Company is over 35 years old and we specialize in developing and selling small audio and video distribution and security products that are sought after world-wide due to our reputation for quality.

lender.name: Stephen Postlethwaite
lender.occupational_info: I am studying to design computer games.

lender.name: Rachael
lender.loan_because: I want to help give people opportunites they might not otherwise have.

lender.name: Kathy
lender.loan_because: Because even a little bit can help.

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: I'm just doing my small part. Hard working people around the world should have the same chance for happy life as I do. I can't help but imagine myself in their shoes.
lender.occupational_info: I study economics at the University of British Columbia.

lender.name: Craig
lender.loan_because: we are all ONE.

lender.name: Vikash
lender.loan_because: the idea of helping individuals around the world create a business to help feed their families, support their own economy and assist individuals who want to be proactive is something that anyone can become passionate about.
lender.occupational_info: I help with projects, processes and management for a company that makes it possible for individuals to buy homes

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I can! I think it is really cool to be able to help someone who is less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: I lease office space to companies in Ridgeland, Mississippi.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: We all need good Karma.
lender.occupational_info: Textbook publishing.

lender.name: Max
lender.loan_because: I can and someone out there will use the money in the correct way. Semper Fi !

lender.name: Meg
lender.loan_because: I have a an independent editing business and know how arduous it can be to make it profitable. If I can be of some help to another business owner, it makes me feel good.
lender.occupational_info: Editing for all your business, academic, and nonfiction needs.

lender.name: Andi
lender.loan_because: "We need to be the change we wish to see in the world."

lender.name: Dan & Diansa
lender.loan_because: Kiva is a wonderful concept. The idea of knowing your money directly helps someone makes it all very personal.
lender.occupational_info: We work in sales.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: It gives people an opportunity to help themselves and help communities.

lender.name: Eleanor
lender.loan_because: ...because I've got a little bit to share.
lender.occupational_info: I work with authors to write textbooks for college and university level courses.

lender.name: Juddie, remembering Dad
lender.loan_because: I know it makes a difference to peoples' lives
lender.occupational_info:
Wooden-boat builder, furniture maker and odd-job man, very busy in my retirement.
** Note from Dick's daughter, Juddie ** My father passed away in February 2009. We have established a memorial team in his name, and will transfer his Kiva loans and reinvest his contributions as part of the Dick Adamson Memorial Fund when we can.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I know what it's like being poor, I know what it's like living pay check to pay check. I've never been rich and may never be. But, as long as I can help someone else, I will do what I can.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I love helping others

lender.name: Marla
lender.loan_because: I couldn't not.

lender.name: Dick
lender.loan_because: As you have done for the least of these, you have done for me.

lender.name: Oliver & Angela
lender.loan_because: We like to help people who work hard. We're also excited to see our investments well used!
lender.occupational_info:
Oliver is an Enterprise Architect and he designs computer and telephone networks.
Angela is an Information and Knowledge Manager and she classifies and organizes information. Information and knowledge management help people and organizations understand what information they own so that it can be used more competitively.

lender.name: Ron
lender.loan_because: I am blessed to be able to live in a wealthy country and wealthy area of that country. This is an important way to support our human relatives around the world for whom access to capital is difficult. Our lending can make a real difference in someone's life.

lender.name: Todd
lender.loan_because: i have a little extra money and I want to show God's love in a practical way
lender.occupational_info: I oversee the operations of a summer camp for children

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I can make a difference in the lives of my sisters and brothers around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I help others see and share the beauty of creation.

lender.name: Dawn
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with family and friends
lender.occupational_info: I take care of people that are sick

lender.name: Todd
lender.loan_because: Free trade, commerce and ownership rights help drive the most efficient allocation of resources known to man
lender.occupational_info: I am in Sales for a 100 year old company that makes Bleach and other consumer goods.

lender.name: Ian
lender.occupational_info: I am studying to be a professor of Mathematics. In the meantime, I help teach basic math classes.

lender.name: Brian
lender.occupational_info: I am supervisor at a casino, where people make bets with even less of an expected return than these loans.

lender.name: Alex and Sydney
lender.occupational_info: provide medical care

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I can. Everyone needs a little help occasionally.

lender.name: Carey
lender.loan_because: those who ask should receive.
lender.occupational_info: I am stationed near the DMZ, helping defend the South Korean people.

lender.name: bahareh
lender.loan_because: I find this to be one of the best ways to help people become self sufficient and for me to invest money in a local community that desperately needs it.
lender.occupational_info: Working on Juris Doctorate

lender.name: Bhalchander Vishwanath
lender.loan_because: This is a great way to help entrepreneurs create jobs and help society.
lender.occupational_info: Check out : http://www.unitedprosperity.org

lender.name: Shirley J
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of giving a hand up, and not a hand out. All hard working people deserve a chance.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: I've heard this is a good way to help people support themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info:
I'm a musician. I conduct a church choir and play French horn in a community band. I write music for both.
I'm also the Director of a Center for the Arts at our church, where we provide education, support and opportunities for sharing to musicians and visual artists.

lender.name: Michael
lender.occupational_info: I build apartment buildings

lender.name: Ashley
lender.loan_because: I want to know that I'm helping other people, and this way I can do it on an individual basis, put a face to a name, and see the results.

lender.name: Shari
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Pepper
lender.loan_because: Everyone is responsible for everyone else. This seems like a great way to sidestep government aid, and lend my money my way to the people I choose to help.
lender.occupational_info: I play in a political punk band here in Los Angeles called Bobot Adrenaline

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Christian Pastor

lender.name: The Wasiak Foundation
lender.loan_because: To help the women of the world fight the social inequities of the past.
lender.occupational_info: I look after computer systems.

lender.name: Debashis
lender.loan_because: I like helping people become self-sufficient. It's the least I can do. :-)
lender.occupational_info: I manage a team of people working on next generation design software.

lender.name: Andrea & Brad
lender.loan_because: It is a nice way to help others.
lender.occupational_info: We live near the Skagit River and enjoy beekeeping, hiking, birding, sea kayaking, and walking with our Beagles - Harley & Junebug.

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: I've been very fortunate, and want to help someone else if I can.

lender.name: Tori
lender.loan_because: By small and simple things are great things brought to pass.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I want to help people achieve their dreams, as others have helped me.

lender.name: J S
lender.loan_because: "Give a man a fish and he eats for one day; teach a man to fish and he eats for a lifetime." A hand up is better than a hand out.

lender.name: Miglena
lender.loan_because: It takes little to change someone's life...

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: everyone should have a chance to improve their situation.
lender.occupational_info: Just a broke college student, trying to make a small difference. I am a biology nut who loves the ocean and photography. I have my assistant teacher permit and am working Part Time in Orlando, FL. (quite the commute from Napa...) I love to travel and have been to France, Japan, Vietnam, and Cambodia. I would like to one day visit Nepal and Bhutan.

lender.name: J.MARUTHU
lender.loan_because: for education MBA

lender.name: Jane B
lender.loan_because: Personally I think helping others & sharing is part of being a world citizen, as well as a privilege. Professionally, my company regularly donates, and puts a percentage of gross income to help small businesses and groups in other countries. As a businesswoman, I choose to support other women.
lender.occupational_info: I work with business owners and managers to improve their businesses and help them towards better systems of management.

lender.name: Darrell
lender.loan_because: someone helped me.
lender.occupational_info: Air traffic controller

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: I believe that people can make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I and my daughter produce books that explore the human experience.

lender.name: Gina
lender.loan_because: I can! I like investing in mankind.
lender.occupational_info: I help find efficient ways to manage businesses.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because:
There is enough for everyone if we can learn to share.
& because I have benefited from a history that has not been as kind to others.
& because people have helped me when I needed help.
lender.occupational_info: I am a priest in the Episcopal Church (which is part of the Anglican Communion).

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I can. It's incredible that what is pocket change to me can help fund someone else's dream.
lender.occupational_info: Currenly exploring new career opportunities; I have been an Executive Assistant for years and have never been happy with it. I hope to find something that will allow me to use my creativity, be independent, and happier; just not sure yet what that will be.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me with so much, and I want to share.
lender.occupational_info: I operate a computer-run printer for a large printing company.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: I realise how much we have in the culture that we live in and I want to help those who don't have as much opportunity as we do.
lender.occupational_info: I am running a home for children.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: it's great to help people who want to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am a physician.

lender.name: Veronica
lender.loan_because: It's a way to share what I can with others throughout the world, and do something concrete to help them to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: My work is psychotherapy for individuals and couples. I'm trained to help people discover their own inner resources to resolve their problems. I've done this work for over 30 years, and still love it.

lender.name: SCOTT
lender.loan_because: It gives me the chance to help someone else become successful.
lender.occupational_info: I sell contracts that in the event of a fire/theft or accident you will get money to start your business over again.

lender.name: Maura
lender.loan_because: To be able to help people with whatever resources I have at my disposal.
lender.occupational_info: I get to meet great people and help motivate and program their health and fitness goals.

lender.name: Nida
lender.loan_because: I'd like to help my family by putting up my own business

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: I believe in what Vice President Gore's program is doing. It is a small investment which can bring back a large return for the recipient.
lender.occupational_info: I used to work with children between the ages of birth to 21 years old with physical and mental disabilities in the public school setting.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I believe that access to capital is the largest impediment to many impoverished people.
lender.occupational_info: I am a process-expert for specialty paper-making machinery.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I know how difficult life can be.... I like to help others whenever possible.
lender.occupational_info: I was a COTA (Certified Occupational Therapy Assistant) until a car accident ended my working career.

lender.name: Kathy
lender.loan_because: I live a very blessed life. I have never had to go without the things I need in life. I would love to help someone else to live a better life, as well. I wish them many blessings!
lender.occupational_info: I work at a store. I help customers, re-stock the shelves with merchandise and run a cash register.

lender.name: Daryl
lender.loan_because: "If you help the poor, you are lending to the Lord--and He will repay you!" Proverbs 19:17 NLT
lender.occupational_info: Spreading the love of Jesus Christ

lender.name: Stacey
lender.loan_because: everything belongs to God.

lender.name: Dan and Cathy
lender.loan_because: We like helping people willing to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Dan helps companies write web pages. Cathy helps companies with managing their financial business.
